alert.note: Alert for Granville; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 6:10PM EDT until May 16 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Person County in central North Carolina... Northern Granville County in central North Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 610 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roxboro, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oxford, Roxboro, Stovall, Bethel Hill, Mayo Reservoir and Berea. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
